data.eml:eml: First record of the tribe Phlepsiini (Hemiptera: Cicadellidae: Deltocephalinae) from China, with description a new genus and species

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Dai, Ren-Huai, Qu, Ling, Yang, Mao-Fa (2016): First record of the tribe Phlepsiini (Hemiptera: Cicadellidae: Deltocephalinae) from China, with description a new genus and species. Zootaxa 4107 (1): 81-84, DOI: http://doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.4107.1.4
